survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on smartphone battery performance and user satisfaction to help manufacturers improve battery technology and management features.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your current smartphone?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the options are randomized to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Randomize answer options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your current smartphone?

questions.question_text: On average, how often do you need to recharge your smartphone in a day?
answer_options: Three or more times a day
questions.client_notes: Provides insight into battery drain frequency. Use clear, mutually exclusive options.

script.question_text: On average, how often do you need to recharge your smartphone in a day?
answer_options: Three or more times a day

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you typically use that drain your battery the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify high-drain features. Include 'Other' for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you typically use that drain your battery the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use battery-saving modes or features on your smartphone?
questions.client_notes: Measures user engagement with battery-saving features. Use a 5-point frequency scale.

script.question_text: How often do you use battery-saving modes or features on your smartphone?

questions.question_text: What is your preferred method for extending battery life?
questions.client_notes: Identifies user strategies for managing battery life. Include 'Other' for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What is your preferred method for extending battery life?

questions.question_text: How important is fast charging capability to you when choosing a smartphone?
questions.client_notes: Measures the importance of fast charging in purchasing decisions. Use a 5-point Likert scale.

script.question_text: How important is fast charging capability to you when choosing a smartphone?

questions.question_text: Have you ever replaced your smartphone's battery?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to gauge battery replacement behavior.

script.question_text: Have you ever replaced your smartphone's battery?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q7, what was the primary reason for replacing the battery?
questions.client_notes: Follow-up question for those who replaced their battery. Include 'Other' for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q7, what was the primary reason for replacing the battery?

questions.question_text: How long does your smartphone's battery typically last before needing a replacement?
answer_options: I have never replaced a battery
questions.client_notes: Provides insight into battery lifespan. Include an option for those who haven't replaced a battery.

script.question_text: How long does your smartphone's battery typically last before needing a replacement?
answer_options: I have never replaced a battery

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future smartphone battery technology?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture user suggestions for battery improvements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future smartphone battery technology?
